3D Printing in Concretes

In 2017, PTCAT tested cement-based materials for 3D Printing Techonology.

Find out more
New 3D Printing Materials

In 2017, PTCAT are developing advanced 3D printing materials using traditional and/or natural materials for high value-added 3D Printing Materials

Find out more
Materials for 3D Data Base

In 2017, PTCAT are building data base for a variety of raw materials including natural and/or artificial materials

Find out more
Catalytic Processing for Hardening In 3D

In 2017, PTCAT are building data base for a variety of raw materials including natural and/or artificial materials

Find out more
Large-Scale 3D Printing

In 2017, PTCAT are building a novel strategy for large-scale 3D Printing in combination with robotic construction

Find out more
Standardization of 3D Printing

In 2017, PTCAT are developing a variety of techniques which can monitor 3D Printing Processing in order to optimize the 3D materials and processing

Find out more

The Hongik Institute on Complex Systems serves as a hub and facilitator for pathbreaking and relevant research in complexity and data science transcending the boundaries of established disciplines.

PTCAT Listser

Subscribe to the PTCAT Listserv Subscribe to the PTCAT Listserv and receive information about the Special seminars or other PTCAT related information.
To subscribe, send an email with only "SUBSCRIBE" in the subject line to PTCAT@wow.hongik.ac.kr.
To unsubscribe, send an email with only "UNSUBSCRIBE" in the subject line to PTCAT@wow.hongik.ac.kr.

PTCAT Reading Group

The PTCAT reading group The PTCAT reading group meets egularly over lunch to discuss recent papers,
fundamentals, and emerging trends in combined R&D of traditional culture and advanced technology.
